text: Roderick Terrance Sawyer (born April 12, 1963) is an American politician. In 2011, he became a member of the Chicago City Council. He is the son for former Mayor Eugene Sawyer. In June 2022, Sawyer announced his candidacy for mayor in the 2023 election, challenging incumbent Mayor Lori Lightfoot. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:DePaul University alumni Category:Chicago City Council members Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Roderick Sawyer
